sentence: Todd Bunton, CFA, Growth & Income Stock Strategist at Zacks Investment Research, discusses two stocks that might be worth a closer look by investors:Home Depot (HD) and DineEquity (DIN).
Both companies recently delivered solid Q2 results, prompting analysts to revise their estimates meaningfully higher for both 2014 and 2015.
And both offer solid growth potential and strong dividend yields while trading at reasonable prices.
But what else should investors take away from these two companies?
